page.title: 06Bramhope: Entertainment
page.content: There are opportunities for taking part in almost every conceivable form of cultural,educational and recreational activity in the village. Both churches, the Craven Insitute and the local schools are the chief venues for these activities.An art club holds an annual exhibition in Golden Acre Park.The Bramhope Players entertain in the Craven Institute on several occasions each year.The local schools and youth organisations take part in plays,talent spotting and other competitions.The adult community is well served by different societies (such as bridge clubs,men's supper club and 2 women's fellowship) The mobile library visits the village once a week and there are numerous talks,slide and film shows and other such events throughout the year.
